comment: Americans believe in MAGIC! Liberals believe a supernatural "blue wave" is sure to rescue their cause. Antisemites believe that tiny Israel and the Jews worldwide are controlling their lives through PLOTS. Then there are those ODD folks who follow Q, with its' hashtags and cryptic abbreviations. I'm puzzled, skeptical to a fault. Anybody?

Antisemites believe that tiny Israel and the Jews worldwide are controlling their lives through PLOTS. Then there are those ODD folks who follow Q, with its' hashtags and cryptic abbreviations. I'm puzzled, skeptical to a fault. Anybody?

      :snt1 (b / believe-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "America")))
            :ARG1 (m2 / MAGIC))

                        :poss p2)
                  :ARG1-of (s2 / sure-02)))
      :snt3 (b4 / believe-01

                        :op1 "Antisemite"))
            :ARG1 (c3 / control-01

                                    :op1 "Israel")
                              :mod (t / tiny))
                        :op2 (p3 / person

                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Jew")))
                        :location (w2 / worldwide))

                  :instrument (p4 / pot)))
      :snt4 (f / folk

            :ARG0-of (f2 / follow-02

                  :manner a
                  :op1 (h / hashtag

comment: Being against Jews is not the same thing as being against all Semites. Therefore anti-Jew doesn't necessarily equal anti-Semite. I have problems with Jews but I love Sumerians and Canaanites and Phoenicians, which are all Semite groups.
amr:
# ::snt Being against Jews is not the same thing as being against all Semites. Therefore anti-Jew doesn't necessarily equal anti-Semite. I have problems with Jews but I love Sumerians and Canaanites and Phoenicians, which are all Semite groups.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / same-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (o / oppose-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :mod (r / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Jew"))))
            :ARG2 (o2 / oppose-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :mod (e / ethnic-group
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Semite"))
                        :mod (a / all))))
      :snt2 (c / cause-01
            :ARG1 (e2 / equal-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (o3 / oppose-01
                        :ARG1 p)
                  :ARG2 (o4 / oppose-01
                        :ARG1 p2)
                  :ARG1-of (n3 / need-01)))
      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (p3 / problem
                        :topic (e3 / ethnic-group
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Jew"))))
            :ARG2 (l / love-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p4 / person
                              :mod (w / world-region
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "Sumeria")))
                        :op2 (p5 / person
                              :mod (e4 / ethnic-group
                                    :name (n6 / name
                                          :op1 "Canaite")))
                        :op3 (p6 / person
                              :mod (e5 / ethnic-group
                                    :name (n7 / name
                                          :op1 "Phoenician")))
                        :domain e3))))
